alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hillsborough County through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palm River-Clair Mel, or near Brandon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Brandon, Palm River-Clair Mel, Riverview, East Lake-Orient Park, Ybor City, Channelside, Progress Village, Gibsonton, Palm River, Peter O Knight Airport and Boyette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
